// Generated by style-generator, be careful when editing this file

type cssClass = CssClass(string)

let join = classes =>
  classes->Js.Array2.map((CssClass(c)) => c)->Js.Array2.joinWith(" ")

let joinOpt = classes => classes->Js.Array2.reduce((acc, x) =>
    switch x {
    | Some(x) => acc->Js.Array2.concat([x])
    | None => acc
    }
  , [])->join

{% for class in classes %}
let {{class|name}} = CssClass("{{class}}")
{% endfor %}
